tool.name: echo
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayb False output_data_a $output_data_a output_data_b $output_data_b name echo a '$a' b $b pause $pause prefer $prefer response $response outputType_a '$OutputSection_a.outputType_a' transmissionMode_a $OutputSection_a.transmissionMode_a outputType_b $OutputSection_b.outputType_b transmissionMode_b $OutputSection_b.transmissionMode_b

param.name: b
param.label: Complex Input
param.help: A complex input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json

param.name: pause
param.label: Literal Input (double)
param.help: An optional input which can be used to specify the number of seconds to pause the service before returning

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_a
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_b
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Simply echo the value provided as input
